page.description: Copies the values from one row in a Repeating Section to another.

argument.name: repeatingSectionID
argument.description: The repeating section that contains the source row.

argument.name: sourceRow
argument.description: The source row in the repeating section that contains the data you want to copy.

argument.name: targetRow
argument.description: The row targeted to copy data into.

argument.name: flagPromptIfTargetRowDirty)
argument.description: Logical. A true setting will indicate if the targeted row that you are copying data into is dirty.

section.description: If targetRow = -1, then the current row with focus is the targetRow. If the target row is dirty, a confirmation prompt is displayed, unless flagPromptIfTargetRowDirty is false.;
